ArrayPicker.MainDesc: This element will pick one value out of a array of values
ArrayPicker.Attribute: This attribute should either contain the array of values or should be linked to an array, e.g. an column of a table.
ArrayPicker.ValueIndex: This attibute defines which values has to be picked from the array. It is 0-based, 0 will pick the first value, 1 the second and so on.
ArrayPicker.Output: The picked value will be copied into this attribute Value.
